tool_input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Add comprehensive learning materials for LangGraph workflow

This commit adds complete educational resources to help understand
the LangGraph PRP workflow implementation:

- LEARNING_GUIDE.md: 8-part conceptual walkthrough explaining state
  machines, cost optimization, extension patterns, and comparison to
  POC scripts
  
- docs/architecture_diagrams.md: Visual flowcharts showing state flow,
  node execution, context optimization, and failure handling
  
- docs/POC_COMPARISON.md: Side-by-side comparison of POC scripts vs
  LangGraph implementation, demonstrating 50% code reduction and 40%
  cost savings
  
- examples/learning/interactive_walkthrough.py: Hands-on interactive
  script for step-by-step workflow exploration with real-time state
  inspection

These materials provide conceptual understanding, visual aids, and
practical hands-on experience for learning the LangGraph workflow.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
